name: Bridge of Dreams
description:
When night comes, good dreams come to the world using a bridge, but then, Nightmare also want to cross the bridge. Now, all people dreams depends on you!

Controls :

  • Left and Right Arrow for controlling the player.

by : Finiko KasulaNovenda
Credits : App Advisory, Super Brutal Assets, Hyper Luminal Games, Jazz Create Games, Black Hammer. (Unity Asset Store)
Musics : A Lucid Dream (CaliDerium) https://opengameart.org/content/a-lucid-dream
